page.title: 14St Annes - Leisure
page.content: St Annes,well renowned for Golf courses 'Royal Lytham and St Annes' and 'Fairhaven' also owns public recreation grounds available more cheaply.Walking from the square along the front you will arrive at the Open-Air pool.This 110 by 80 foot pool has stood for 70 years and takes about 100,000 people annually.Prices are reasonable 'Adults-75p Children-45p' impvovements are council decided,including the cafe,childrens cars and even fishing in the pool one winter.Open from Easter to late September,the site employs 20 people, and includes miniature golf course and putting green.The Golf Course takes about 1,000 people a week in summer and is only 20 years old.It is very profitable and the council's improvements include new fencing and flags.The entire course is 1.5 acres.
